verses.verse: Then <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H935>went<s%> in and <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "My father and my <S%H1>brothers<s%> and their <S%H251>flocks<s%> and their <S%H6629>herds<s%> and <S%H1241>all<s%> that they have, have <S%H3605>come<s%> out of the <S%H935>land<s%> of <S%H776>Canaan;<s%> and <S%H3667>behold,<s%> they are in the <S%H2009>land<s%> of <S%H776>Goshen.<s%>"
And he <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> from <S%H7097>among<s%> his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> and <S%H3322>presented<s%> <S%H6440><s%> them to <S%H6547>Pharaoh.<s%>

Then <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> <S%H4100>"What<s%> is your <S%H4639>occupation<s%>?" So they <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> "Your <S%H5650>servants<s%> are <S%H7462>shepherds,<s%> <S%H1571>both<s%> we and our fathers."

And they <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> "We have <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H1481>sojourn<s%> in the <S%H776>land,<s%> for <S%H369>there<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H4829>pasture<s%> for your <S%H5650>servants<s%>' <S%H6629>flocks,<s%> for the <S%H7458>famine<s%> is <S%H3515>severe<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan.<s%> <S%H6258>Now,<s%> therefore, <S%H4994>please<s%> let your servants <S%H3427>live<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1657>Goshen.<s%>"
Then <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> "Your father and your <S%H1>brothers<s%> have <S%H251>come<s%> to you.

"The <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> is at your <S%H6440>disposal;<s%> <S%H3427>settle<s%> your father and your <S%H1>brothers<s%> in the <S%H251>best<s%> of the <S%H4315>land,<s%> let them <S%H776>live<s%> in the <S%H3427>land<s%> of <S%H776>Goshen;<s%> and <S%H1657>if<s%> you <S%H518>know<s%> <S%H3045>any<s%> <S%H3426>capable<s%> <S%H2428>men<s%> among them, then <S%H376>put<s%> them in <S%H7760>charge<s%> of my <S%H8269>livestock.<s%>"

Then <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> his father <S%H1>Jacob<s%> and <S%H3290>presented<s%> <S%H5975><s%> him to <S%H6440>Pharaoh;<s%> and <S%H6547>Jacob<s%> <S%H3290>blessed<s%> <S%H1288>Pharaoh.<s%>
And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> <S%H4100>"How<s%> <S%H4100>many<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> have you <S%H9132>lived<s%>?"

So <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> "The <S%H8141>years<s%> of my <S%H4033>sojourning<s%> are one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty;<s%> <S%H4592>few<s%> and <S%H7451>unpleasant<s%> have <S%H1961>been<s%> the <S%H8141>years<s%> of my <S%H9132>life,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> have they <S%H5381>attained<s%> the <S%H8141>years<s%> that my fathers <S%H1>lived<s%> during the <S%H9132>days<s%> of their <S%H3117>sojourning.<s%>"
And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and <S%H3318>went<s%> out from his <S%H6440>presence.<s%>

So <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H3427>settled<s%> his father and his <S%H1>brothers,<s%> and <S%H251>gave<s%> them a <S%H5414>possession<s%> in the <S%H272>land<s%> of <S%H776>Egypt,<s%> in the <S%H4714>best<s%> of the <S%H4315>land,<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H776>Rameses,<s%> as <S%H7486>Pharaoh<s%> had <S%H6547>ordered.<s%>

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H3557>provided<s%> his father and his <S%H1>brothers<s%> and <S%H251>all<s%> his father's <S%H3605>household<s%> with <S%H1004>food,<s%> <S%H3899>according<s%> to their <S%H6310>little<s%> <S%H2945>ones.<s%>

Now <S%H369>there<s%> was <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H3899>food<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H7458>famine<s%> was <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3515>severe,<s%> so that the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> and the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%> <S%H3856>languished<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the <S%H7458>famine.<s%>

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H3950>gathered<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3701>money<s%> that was <S%H4672>found<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> and in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%> for the <S%H7668>grain<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they <S%H7666>bought,<s%> and <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> the <S%H3701>money<s%> into Pharaoh's <S%H1004>house.<s%>

And when the <S%H3701>money<s%> was <S%H8552>all<s%> <S%H8552>spent<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> and in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3051>"Give<s%> us <S%H3899>food,<s%> for <S%H4100>why<s%> should we <S%H4191>die<s%> in your <S%H5048>presence<s%>? For [our] <S%H3701>money<s%> is <S%H656>gone.<s%>"

Then <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3051>"Give<s%> up your <S%H4735>livestock,<s%> and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> you [food] for your <S%H4735>livestock,<s%> <S%H518>since<s%> [your] <S%H3701>money<s%> is <S%H656>gone.<s%>"

So they <S%H935>brought<s%> their <S%H4735>livestock<s%> to <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> and <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> them <S%H3899>food<s%> in exchange for the <S%H5483>horses<s%> and the <S%H6629>flocks<s%> and the <S%H1241>herds<s%> and the <S%H2543>donkeys;<s%> and he <S%H5095>fed<s%> them with <S%H3899>food<s%> in exchange for <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H4735>livestock<s%> that <S%H8141>year.<s%>

And when that <S%H8141>year<s%> was <S%H8552>ended,<s%> they <S%H935>came<s%> to him the <S%H8145>next<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, "We will not <S%H3582>hide<s%> from my <S%H113>lord<s%> that our <S%H3701>money<s%> is <S%H8552>all<s%> <S%H8552>spent,<s%> and the <S%H4735>cattle<s%> <S%H929><s%> are my <S%H113>lord<s%>'s. There is <S%H3808>nothing<s%> <S%H7604>left<s%> for my lord <S%H1115>except<s%> <S%H518><s%> our <S%H1472>bodies<s%> and our <S%H127>lands.<s%>

<S%H4100>"Why<s%> should we <S%H4191>die<s%> before your <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> <S%H1571>both<s%> we and our <S%H127>land<s%>? <S%H7069>Buy<s%> us and our <S%H127>land<s%> for <S%H3899>food,<s%> and we and our <S%H127>land<s%> will be <S%H5650>slaves<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh.<s%> So <S%H5414>give<s%> us <S%H2233>seed,<s%> that we may <S%H2421>live<s%> and not <S%H4191>die,<s%> and that the <S%H127>land<s%> may not be <S%H3456>desolate.<s%>"

So <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H7069>bought<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> for <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> for <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H4714>Egyptian<s%> <S%H4376>sold<s%> his <S%H7704>field,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H7458>famine<s%> was <S%H2388>severe<s%> upon them. Thus the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H1961>became<s%> Pharaoh's.
And as for the <S%H5971>people,<s%> he <S%H5674>removed<s%> them to the <S%H5892>cities<s%> from one <S%H7097>end<s%> of Egypt's <S%H1366>border<s%> to the <S%H7097>other.<s%>

<S%H7534>Only<s%> the <S%H127>land<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests<s%> he did not <S%H7069>buy,<s%> for the <S%H3548>priests<s%> had an <S%H2706>allotment<s%> from <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and they <S%H398>lived<s%> <S%H398>off<s%> the <S%H2706>allotment<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> them. <S%H5921>Therefore,<s%> <S%H3651><s%> they did not <S%H4376>sell<s%> their <S%H127>land.<s%>

Then <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H2005>"Behold,<s%> I have <S%H3117>today<s%> <S%H7069>bought<s%> you and your <S%H127>land<s%> for <S%H6547>Pharaoh;<s%> <S%H1887>now,<s%> [here] is <S%H2233>seed<s%> for you, and you may <S%H2232>sow<s%> the <S%H127>land.<s%>

"And at the <S%H8393>harvest<s%> you shall <S%H5414>give<s%> a <S%H2549>fifth<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and four-fifths shall be your own for <S%H2233>seed<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> and for your <S%H400>food<s%> and for those of your <S%H1004>households<s%> and as <S%H398>food<s%> for your <S%H2945>little<s%> <S%H2945>ones.<s%>"

So they <S%H559>said,<s%> "You have <S%H2421>saved<s%> our <S%H2421>lives!<s%> Let us <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of my <S%H113>lord,<s%> and we will be Pharaoh's <S%H5650>slaves.<s%>"

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H7760>made<s%> it a <S%H2706>statute<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> [valid] to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> that <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> should have the <S%H2569>fifth;<s%> <S%H7534>only<s%> the <S%H127>land<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests<s%> did not <S%H1961>become<s%> Pharaoh's.

Now <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> in <S%H1657>Goshen,<s%> and they <S%H270>acquired<s%> <S%H270>property<s%> in it and were <S%H6509>fruitful<s%> and <S%H7235>became<s%> <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7235>numerous.<s%>

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H7651>seventeen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8141>years;<s%> so the <S%H3117>length<s%> of Jacob's <S%H9132>life<s%> was one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and forty-seven <S%H8141>years.<s%>

When the <S%H3117>time<s%> for <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H4191>die<s%> <S%H7126>drew<s%> <S%H7126>near,<s%> he <S%H7121>called<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H4994>"Please,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> I have <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> in your <S%H5869>sight,<s%> <S%H7760>place<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> your <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> my <S%H3409>thigh<s%> and <S%H6213>deal<s%> with me in <S%H2617>kindness<s%> and <S%H571>faithfulness.<s%> <S%H4994>Please<s%> do not <S%H6912>bury<s%> me in <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%>

but when I <S%H7901>lie<s%> <S%H7901>down<s%> with my fathers, you shall <S%H1>carry<s%> me out of <S%H5375>Egypt<s%> and <S%H4714>bury<s%> me in their <S%H6912>burial<s%> <S%H6900>place.<s%> "And he <S%H6900>said,<s%> "I will <S%H559>do<s%> as you have <S%H6213>said.<s%> "
And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7650>"Swear<s%> to me." So he <S%H7650>swore<s%> to him. Then <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7812>bowed<s%> [in worship] at the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H4296>bed.<s%>
